content.query:
DROP PROCEDURE [metadata].[sp_update_runtime_params]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [metadata].[sp_update_runtime_params] @pipeline_name [VARCHAR](255),@runtime_param_value [VARCHAR](255),@md_update_user [VARCHAR](255) AS
BEGIN
    
	UPDATE [metadata].[control_runtime_params]
	SET [runtime_param_value] = @runtime_param_value,
		[md_update_user] = @md_update_user,
		[md_update_datetime] = GETDATE()
	WHERE [pipeline_name] = @pipeline_name
END
GO
